doc.description: Perform a single file objectification and manage its manipulation.

name: bbn\File

__construct.name: __construct

getSize.name: getSize
getSize.comments:
/**
   * Return the filesize in byte.
   *
   * ```php
   * $file = new bbn\File('C:/Test/file.txt');
   * X::dump($file->getSize());
   * // (int) 314
   * ```
   *
   * @return int
   */

iterateLines.name: iterateLines

getExtension.name: getExtension
getExtension.summary: Return the extension of the file.
getExtension.comments:
/**
   * Return the extension of the file.
   *
   * ```php
   * $file = new File('C:/Test/file.txt');
   * X::dump($file->getExtension());
   * //(string) 'txt'
   * ```
   *
   * @return string|false
   */

make.name: make
make.summary: Creates a temporary file in tmp directory.

doc.description: Creates a temporary file in tmp directory.

make.comments:
/**
   * Creates a temporary file in tmp directory.
   *
   * @todo of adjusting
   * @return file
   */

download.name: download
download.summary: Downloads the file. At the end of the script the user will be invited to choose the file's destination. If the file doesn't exist return an object with parameter file = null.

getHash.name: getHash
getHash.summary: Return the hash of the file.
getHash.comments:
/**
   * Return the hash of the file.
   *
   * ```php
   * $file = new File('C:/Test/file.txt');
   * X::dump($file->getHash());
   * // (string) '9a3182g36a83adtd9c9c2l59ap2a719c'
   * ```
   *
   * @return string
   */

delete.name: delete

save.name: save
save.summary: That feature saves the file as a parameter, and accepts a string that contains the path where to save.

doc.description:
That feature saves the file as a parameter, and accepts a string that contains the path where to save.

```php
 $file->save('/home/user/desktop/');
```

save.comments:
/**
   * That feature saves the file as a parameter, and accepts a string that contains the path where to save.
   *
   * ```php
   *  $file->save('/home/user/desktop/');
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $dest
   * @return file
   */
